hooks.prompt:
A file was just modified. Silently check if this change affects any documentation:

1. If a code file changed: check if README, CLAUDE.md, docstrings, or API docs reference the modified functions/classes/configs
2. If drift detected: briefly mention it to the user (e.g., 'Note: This change may require updating X documentation')
3. Do NOT block the workflow - just inform

Do NOT announce this check unless drift is found. Work silently.
